Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its true value to be well above $15000. Considering the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at an exclusive price of $20000. This investment could potentially lead to substantial returns on your business. I look forward to discussing how this product can be a valuable addition to your endeavors. Please let me know if you have any questions or require further information. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $20,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $20,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
